mapper.insert:
DECLARE COUNT NUMBER; BEGIN
SELECT COUNT(*) INTO COUNT FROM SCORE_BOARD WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}
INSERT INTO SCORE_BOARD (SCORENO, USER_NO, PTOC_PTOP, WIN, LST) VALUES (SEQ_SCORE_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{ptcPtp}, #{win}, #{lst})
END
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RANK, d.* FROM (SELECT a.USER_NO userNo, b.USER_ID userId, b.USER_NM userNm, round((a.WIN / (a.WIN + a.LST))*100,2)RATE FROM SCORE_BOARD a JOIN MEMBER b ON a.USER_NO = b.USER_NO WHERE a.WIN + a.LST >= 5 ORDER BY (a.WIN / (a.WIN + a.LST)) DESC) d
